tasks.label: ES Data: Run Conversation
dependsOn: Build: Compile Endless Sky OpenGL Desktop

tasks.label: Code: clang-format-13 endless-sky master
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; set -ex; git fetch https://github.com/endless-sky/endless-sky.git master; git-clang-format-13 --binary clang-format-13 --commit $(git merge-base FETCH_HEAD HEAD)

tasks.label: Code: Merge upstream ES master
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; if ! git diff-index --quiet HEAD --; then tput setaf 1; echo 'ERROR: Commit or stash your changes before proceeding.' >&2; tput sgr 0; exit 1;fi;set -ex; git fetch https://github.com/endless-sky/endless-sky.git master; if git merge-base --is-ancestor FETCH_HEAD HEAD; then set +x;tput setaf 2; echo 'Nothing to do!  You are up to date with endless-sky master.'; tput sgr 0; else git merge --no-ff FETCH_HEAD -m "Merge branch 'master' into $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)"; set +x;tput setaf 2; echo 'Success!  Your branch has been updated with endless-sky master.'; tput sgr 0; fi

tasks.label: Build: Clean and Reset Workspace
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; set -x; scons -c; scons -c tests; rm -f *.AppImage endless-sky.png; git checkout credits.txt XCode/EndlessSky-Info.plist endless-sky.6 source/main.cpp

tasks.label: Build: Compile Endless Sky OpenGL Desktop
Test: Run benchmarks
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; if [ ! -x ./tests/endless-sky-tests ]; then tput setaf 1; echo 'Execute `Build: Run tests` first...' >&2; tput sgr 0; exit 1; fi; set -ex; ./tests/endless-sky-tests '[!benchmark]'

tasks.label: Test: Run headless integration tests
dependsOn: Build: Compile Endless Sky OpenGL Desktop

tasks.label: Package: Reset AppImage Continuous
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; set -e; for x in XCode/EndlessSky-Info.plist credits.txt endless-sky.6 source/main.cpp; do ( set -x; git checkout "$x"; ); done

tasks.label: Package: AppImage Continuous
tasks.command: PS4='$ '; if ! git diff --exit-code credits.txt; then tput setaf 1; echo 'credits.txt has changes according to Git.  Reset it or commit before proceeding.' >&2; tput sgr 0; exit 1; fi; set -ex; ./utils/cd_update_versions.sh; ./utils/build_appimage.sh

tasks.label: ES Plugin: Install reveal map plugin
tasks.command:
PS4='$ '; set -x;mkdir -p ~/.local/share/endless-sky/plugins/dev-mode-reveal-map/data; set +x; echo -e 'mission "Dev mode: reveal map"
	invisible
	landing
	destination Earth
	to offer
		random >= 0
	on offer
		event "Dev mode: visit systems"
event "Dev mode: visit systems"' | tee ~/.local/share/endless-sky/plugins/dev-mode-reveal-map/data/event.txt; grep -r ^system data | cut -d: -f2 | sed 's/^system/	visit/' | tee -a ~/.local/share/endless-sky/plugins/dev-mode-reveal-map/data/event.txt; echo 'Reveal the entire map when leaving any planet.  This will ruin any existing save games by revealing spoilers so use with care.' > ~/.local/share/endless-sky/plugins/dev-mode-reveal-map/about.txt
